svg.title: Fetal Pig Cardiovascular System — Anterior Cross-Section
svg.desc: Interactive SVG of a fetal pig heart showing all four chambers, great vessels, valves, fetal shunts (ductus arteriosus, foramen ovale), and umbilical vasculature for pre-veterinary anatomy study.
svg.text: FETAL PIG CARDIOVASCULAR SYSTEM — ANTERIOR CROSS-SECTION

g.text: R = Right (viewer left) ← → L = Left (viewer right)

svg.text: AnatoView v1.0.0 — Fetal Pig Cardiovascular Model — 18 labeled structures
